price: "Kuma lalle ne mũ, a lõkacin da muka ji shiriya, mun yi ĩmãni da ita. To wanda ya yi ĩimãni da Uhangijinsa, bã zai ji tsõron nakkasa ba, kuma bã zai ji tsõron zãlunci ba."
arabic: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعۡنَا ٱلۡهُدَىٰٓ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦۖ فَمَن يُؤۡمِنۢ بِرَبِّهِۦ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخۡسٗا وَلَا رَهَقٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-annā lammā samiʿ'nā al-hudā āmannā bihi faman yu'min birabbihi falā yakhāfu bakhsan walā rahaqan
